title: Why was Columbus unable to find the trade route to the East? - Quora

response.answer_text: The original plan had been to sail west straight to the East Indies; it was already known that a direct sea route sailing east did not exist because of the Eurasian land mass and Africa. I think Columbus largely believed he had been or was on the verge of being successful, although it took decades beyond his life time to realize the westward route was blocked by North and South America.
